Description:
Follow up the preventive maintenance for all the machines and equipment.
Collaborate with Production Engineers to streamline production facilities, lower the frequency of equipment failure and design effective strategies to improve overall site functioning.
Hold daily, weekly, monthly and quarterly staff meetings to review site performance.
Operate site equipment and supervise site personnel, including technicians and foremen.Skills
Skills:
The ability to build relationships with clients quickly.
A self-sufficient and dependable individual who is consistent in their output.
Thorough understanding of electrical circuits and related equipment alongside expertise with a Programmable Logic Controller (PLC).
Comprehensive knowledge of manufacturing and production equipment.
